rit.contoken.mobile
Class ConTokenActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      rit.contoken.mobile.ConTokenActivity

public class ConTokenActivity
extends Activity

The mobile client prototype of the Continuous Token system

Version:
1.0 Build 001 Sep 1, 2011.
Author:
Prach Chaisatien

Field Summary
 boolean conFlag
          the current connection status (simulation only)
 DeviceConnection deviceconnection
          an object for internet connection (verify signal status, send status, receive status)
 DeviceStorage devicestorage
          an object for private device storage (save and get token or genFlag)
 boolean genFlag
          the current Generator's Flag (before it is stored)
 TextView GenFlagTV
          A TextView to display Generator's Flag (DeviceStorage.getGenFlag(this))
 JSONObject json
          an object to parse JSON message returned from the server
 java.lang.String passwd
          password (when the Token reset operation is required) (may link to Rakuten account password)
 StatusMessage sm
          a temporary StatusMessage object
 TextView StatusTV
          A TextView to display status
 java.lang.String token
          the current Token (before it is sent or stored)
 TextView TokenStorageTV
          A TextView to display Token Storage (DeviceStorage.getToken(this))
 java.lang.String uid
          the device id (statically assigned in the test)
 java.lang.String uname
          user name (when the Token reset operation is required) (may link to Rakuten account username)
 
Constructor Summary
ConTokenActivity()
           
 
Method Summary
 void check()
          check Token by connecting to the Continuous server using ConTokenValidator.check(uid,context)
will prompt for Username and Password if ConTokenValidator.check(uid,context) return StatusMessage(true,"/*sometext/NG/*sometext/")
 void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
          Android Override: Called when the activity is first created.
 boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
          Android Override
 boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
          Android Override: define an action when the menu element is clicked
click Menu-->Connect to check the current Token via the server communication
click Menu-->Options-->ConFlag to override the value of the connection status
click Menu-->Options-->GenFlag to override the value of the the generator's flag (genFlag)
click Menu-->Options-->token_storage create/delete the file named token_storage
enter the new token (String) as the method promptInput() is called
click Menu-->Options-->genflag_storage create/delete the file named genflag_storage
enter the new genFlag (true or false) as the method promptTF() is called
 boolean onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
          Android Override: initialize the option menu (Menu-->Options)according to the device storage status
the ConFlag radio button is selected if it's value is true (the connection status)
the GenFlag radio button is selected if it's value is true (the generator's flag)
the token_storage radio button is selected if the file named token_storage is existed
the genflag_storage radio button is selected if the file named genflag_storage is existed
 void promptInput()
          prompt the user with the Token Input Box (to override the value of token)
 void promptPassword()
          prompt the user with the Password Input Box (for username/password authentication process)
 void promptUsername()
          prompt the user with the Username Input Box (for username/password authentication process)
 void refresh()
          update the data in all display elements (TextBoxs)
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Constructor Detail

ConTokenActivity

public ConTokenActivity()
Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
Android Override: Called when the activity is first created.
  • initialize TokenStorageTV,GenFlagTV,StatusTV
  • TokenStorageTV is set to devicestorage.getToken(this).msg
  • GenFlagTV is set to devicestorage.getGenFlag(this).msg
  • if there is no Token in the device storage
    call promptUsername() to request username/password authentication and reset the Token

    • onCreateOptionsMenu

    public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
    Android Override

    check

    public void check()
    check Token by connecting to the Continuous server using ConTokenValidator.check(uid,context)
    will prompt for Username and Password if ConTokenValidator.check(uid,context) return StatusMessage(true,"/*sometext/NG/*sometext/")

    onPrepareOptionsMenu

    public boolean onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
    Android Override: initialize the option menu (Menu-->Options)according to the device storage status
  • the ConFlag radio button is selected if it's value is true (the connection status)
  • the GenFlag radio button is selected if it's value is true (the generator's flag)
  • the token_storage radio button is selected if the file named token_storage is existed
  • the genflag_storage radio button is selected if the file named genflag_storage is existed

    • onOptionsItemSelected

    public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
    Android Override: define an action when the menu element is clicked
  • click Menu-->Connect to check the current Token via the server communication
  • click Menu-->Options-->ConFlag to override the value of the connection status
  • click Menu-->Options-->GenFlag to override the value of the the generator's flag (genFlag)
  • click Menu-->Options-->token_storage create/delete the file named token_storage
    enter the new token (String) as the method promptInput() is called
  • click Menu-->Options-->genflag_storage create/delete the file named genflag_storage
    enter the new genFlag (true or false) as the method promptTF() is called

    • promptInput

    public void promptInput()
    prompt the user with the Token Input Box (to override the value of token)

    promptUsername

    public void promptUsername()
    prompt the user with the Username Input Box (for username/password authentication process)

    promptPassword

    public void promptPassword()
    prompt the user with the Password Input Box (for username/password authentication process)

    refresh

    public void refresh()
    update the data in all display elements (TextBoxs)
